edu.gmu.cs332.hw5
Class TextShapeFactory

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--edu.gmu.cs332.hw5.TextShapeFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
ShapeFactory
public class TextShapeFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements ShapeFactory

TestShapeFactory is a concrete factory that produces Shape objects. It generates these shapes based on information provided in a string containing the shape's color and vertex coordinates. Here is an example of a red line segment: RED (1 1) (2 2) And here is an example of a blue square: BLUE (0 0) (0 2) (2 2) (2 0) The coordinates should be ordered clockwise, starting at the lowest left vertex.

Author:
Tim Cheadle

private java.awt.Color getColorMapping(java.lang.String color)
